markdownRemark.html: Alliance Francaise is certified by the French Alliance Foundation and the International Center for Pedagogical Studies (CIEP), and is also an operator of the French Embassy, ​​the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the French Ministry of Education. The Alliance Française de Málaga is the only examining center in Malaga of the internationally recognized official DELF / DALF diplomas. We support schools in the province of Malaga promoting multilingualism.
